hymn.title: All the signs point to the end
hymn.category: Hope of Glory—Preparing for Christ's Return

layout.singingstanza: All the signs point to the end, Christ soon will be here a -- gain; We must be rea -- dy for Him— Je -- sus is com -- ing a -- gain! Com -- ing a -- gain, com -- ing a -- gain, Time is swift -- ly pass -- ing by, Soon we may hear the mid -- night cry! Com -- ing a -- gain, com -- ing a -- gain, As the wise vir -- gins we must be pre -- pared! Je -- sus is com -- ing a -- gain!

lyrics.stanza: Coming again, coming again, Time is swiftly passing by, Soon we may hear the midnight cry! Coming again, coming again, As the wise virgins we must be prepared! Jesus is coming again!
Let us go forth unto Him, Not only with our lamps trimmed, Buy the oil now lest they dim— Jesus is coming again!
